item.title: 13 celebrities whose age will surprise you
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
Gwen Stefani is 47 years old Do not see, right? Salma Hayek fills 50 this year Imagine if you look like that when you’re 50. Alyson Hannigan is 42 years old Can not believe Jennifer Aniston is 47 years old Seriously, does not seem to be a day over 30. Jim Parsons is 43 years […]

item.title: A man films his grandma dancing and posts the video on Youtube.
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
Jeanne Harr has always been a big fan of Whitney Houston, and her passing in 2012 broke her heart. She wanted to pay homage to him by dancing on one of his songs. But Jeanne is not a fan like the others. And yes, she is 90 years old! His grandson Adam proposes to film him. From the first […]

The post A man films his grandma dancing and posts the video on Youtube. appeared first on ViralMuffin.

item.title: Nicolas Flamel, the greatest alchemist of all time
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
A happy life Flamel was born around 1335 in the small town of Pontoise, near Paris. Little is known about his childhood and youth, his parents are known to be “good people” who enjoy a comfortable lifestyle. After a few years spent in Pontoise, the Flamel family moved to Paris. Little Nicolas goes to apprenticeship at a bookseller […]

The post Nicolas Flamel, the greatest alchemist of all time appeared first on ViralMuffin.

item.title: The true story of the werewolves
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
Unknown and feared, the wolf terrorized our medieval ancestors for a long time. When this wolf became a wolf-man, baptized as a werewolf, the fright redoubled. Legends about men who turn into wolves have been known since antiquity. The very term “lycanthropy” comes from the Greek king Lycaon – sovereign of Arcadia – transformed by Zeus into a wolf for daring to […]

The post The true story of the werewolves appeared first on ViralMuffin.
